body: Hi Ehsan, Anton's suggestion should solve your issue. The issue happens because Honeybee fails to figure out the adjacencies correctly. Do you really need the geometry to be this complex? EnergyPlus will probably take a good amount of time to run the analysis for this geometry. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/c2myy45ArwM4Y-LsuVbR9eA-gDIzf7i2dM1EelIcUPj8GmOsN5ATfxLXigNlFw31WCYzGBobYkH72yk6nbE7wga5gy5fulqv/adjacency.png)
